description.value:
For Orks, Rare. When worn gives +10 to Command Tests when interacting with Orks. Designed to be strapped to the back of an Ork, with the pole's symbol above them.

Requirements

Covered in skulls, sharp bits, and Orkish Glyphs. Worn by Nobz and Warbosses. A human attempting to use it (such as as a banner pole) might not have the same effect.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
